response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und missbrauchen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and misuse personal data, highlighting the importance of data privacy and security. the use of hashtags such as #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #security emphasizes the need for awareness and action around this issue.
